aspiration:Polymerization.NAME: Polymerization
aspiration:Polymerization.DESCRIPTION: aspiration:Fuse all your orbs. NL Exhaust.
aspiration:Polymerization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aspiration:Fuse all your orbs. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

aspiration:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
aspiration:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times and lose 1 Dexterity per enemy. NL Exhaust.

aspiration:UnbridledHammer.NAME: Unbridled Hammer
aspiration:UnbridledHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand X times.
aspiration:UnbridledHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X+1 times. runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand X+1 times.
